_header: Inwardly lord beseech I the / All my trespass forgive thou me
Title(s): An orisoun for negligence of the X Commandments
_description: ‘An orisoun for negligence of the X Commandments’ — fourteen couplets

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
INwardliche lord bi seche i þeAl my trespas for ȝiue
                    þou me…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…ffor ȝif me now and alle menÞat haue broken þi
                    comaundemens ten

BLAdd37787.First Lines:
Inward lyche lord biseche I þeAll my trespas forȝif it
                    me…
BLAdd37787.Last Lines:
…ffor ȝif me nou and alle menÞat hau broken þi
                    commaundemens ten
